message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $85 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $105. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to come down on the price. I'm really hoping to stay within my budget, so I'm going to offer $95.  Is that something you'd consider?
Hi Bob, I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway. I'm still not sure if $95 is enough, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about I sell it to you for $110? It's the best I can do.
